problems.question: Which way is the bus heading?
problems.title: Bus

problems.question: Which letter of the English alphabet flies, sings, and stings?
problems.title: Word Play

problems.question: Bob’s father has 4 children. Momo, Meme, and Mumu are three of them. Who’s the fourth?
problems.title: Family

problems.question: If you have me, you want to share me. If you share me, you haven't got me. What am I?
problems.title: CIA

problems.question: What is always coming but never arrives?
problems.title: No use waiting

problems.question: What goes all around town but never comes inside?
problems.title: Around town

problems.question: What goes all around town but never comes inside?
problems.title: Around town

problems.question: You are driving a bus. At the first stop, two women get on. The second stop, three men get on and one woman gets off. At the third stop, three kids and their mom get on, and a man gets off. The bus is grey, and it is raining outside. What color is the bus driver’s hair?
problems.title: The driver

problems.question: Mike is a butcher. He is 5’10” tall. What does he weigh?
problems.title: Butcher

problems.question: If there are 12 fish and half of them drown, how many are there?
problems.title: Fish

problems.question: I met a man with seven wives.Each wife had seven sacks,Each sack had seven cats,Each cat had seven kits.Kits, cats, sacks and wives,How many were going to St. Ives?
problems.title: On the road
